title: Karlie Kloss
summary:
Karlie Elizabeth Kloss (born August 3, 1992)[5] is an American fashion model. Vogue Paris declared her one of the "top 30 models of the 2000s" when she was 17.[6]
Kloss was a Victoria's Secret Angel from 2013 until 2015; she resigned to study at New York University.[7] Models.com has said that Kloss "represents the gold standard of modeling—a girl with the look, the poise, and the drive to take things to the next level," and she ranks on their "New Supers" and "Money Girl" lists.[8][9] By 2019, she had appeared on 40 international Vogue covers.[10]
